Lyric:
[by:hondoes]
[00:00.01]After the after the party we're gonna keep it going
[00:05.01]We're gonna rip it up, the neighbours might complain
[00:09.24]
[00:11.69]I think it's almost 4am but baby I'm still feeling just fine
[00:16.90]Ice all up in a plastic cup and I'ma keep on sipping all night, yeah
[00:22.02]I might a kissed a thousand lips but maybe that's just all in my mind
[00:26.90]Some people never understand the way we live but we're living life
[00:31.12]
[00:32.16]Uh huh, hey, uh huh, Monday to Sunday, it's never too late
[00:37.64]So everyone say, "We don't wanna stop!"
[00:40.20]
[00:41.05]Cause after the afterparty, we're gonna keep it goin'
[00:46.20]We're gonna rip it up, the neighbours might complain
[00:51.16]Cause after the afterparty, we're gonna stay 'til mornin'
[00:56.47]Then when the time is up, we'll do it all again
[01:01.72]Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
[01:07.45]We're all in love
[01:10.16]We're all in love
[01:11.45]
[01:13.36]I'm hangin' on my best friend's couch and my clothes are all on the floor
[01:18.69]I got glitter in my underwear like it was Studio 54, yeah
[01:23.86]I can't remember why I love it, but I need it baby, clap, bring on the encore
[01:28.55]Let's pour another drink, the glasses go *clink*
[01:31.10]Yeah, we're always up for one more
[01:33.08]
[01:33.67]Uh huh, hey, uh huh, Monday to Sunday, it's never too late
[01:39.64]So everyone say, "We don't wanna stop!"
[01:42.59]
[01:42.86]Cause after the afterparty, we're gonna keep it goin'
[01:48.05]We're gonna rip it up, the neighbors might complain
[01:53.12]Cause after the afterparty, afterparty
[01:55.86]We're gonna stay 'til mornin', stay 'til mornin'
[01:58.39]Then when the time is up, we'll do it again, oh yeah
[02:03.63]
[02:04.56]The party just ended but I'm not done with you
[02:07.24]My folks are out of town, we got a crib with a view
[02:09.89]Come over, bring a couple friends, I keep mine with me
[02:12.37]Shout out to Whitney, she was so wicked
[02:15.08]The party was so crazy, the party was so crazy
[02:20.07]Tomorrow I'll be lazy but I'll spend it with you baby
[02:24.68]
[02:25.61]Monday to Sunday doing it our way
[02:28.31]RiRi on replay, cheers to the weekday
[02:30.75]We're all in, we're all in love, yeah
[02:33.36]Drop, drop, drop, drop, drop
[02:34.88]And we do it like ice cream for dinner
[02:37.14]Bucket of liqueur, we're getting sicker
[02:39.74]Don't need Ibiza
[02:41.14]We're all in, we're all in love, yeah
[02:43.71]Drop, drop, drop, drop, drop
[02:45.15]And we do it like

[03:10.64]Then when the time is up, we'll do it all again
